resources.string: Use this to receive messages from a client device running this application on the same network. You can then echo the location messages to Tower or another app running on the same device to direct a drone to those locations.

Use this to send messages to a server device running this application on the same network. Click Send drone locations from Tower to receive them from Tower and send them to the other device. (This is useful if you want a drone controlled by Tower on the other device to follow the one controlled by Tower on this device.) Click Send my locations to send your location to the other device.

Use this to let the drone track your location as you move around. Your location will be sent to a server. The Track Targets mode of the app on the device running Tower will retrieve them and send them to Tower and to the drone, which will follow you.\n\n Note: You need to have a good internet connection.
Your group ID and user ID can be anything, as long as they\'re unique. Multiple user ids within the same group will all show on the map at the same time.

Use this to track multiple remote targets. Select a group to monitor, and the members of the group will show on the map as they move. To follow a specific target, select it on the map. To stop following a target, click Stop Following. Specify whether to send location messages to Tower on this device, or to send the locations to a Relay Server mode of this app on a different device.
